item.title: TcpScanner Using Golang
item.author: Jason
item.description: 1.0 基础版的非并发版扫描 package main import( "fmt" "net" ) func main(){ for i:=1;i<=1024;i++{ address :=fmt.Sprintf("127.0.0.1:%d",i) conn,err:=net.Dial("tcp",address) if err!=nil{ //端口已关闭或过滤 continue } conn.Close() fmt.Printf("%d is open\n",i) } } 2.0 WaitGrop并发控制版扫描 package main import ( "fmt" "net" "sync" ) func main(){ var wg sync.WaitGroup for i:=0;i<1024;i++{ wg.Add(1) go func(j int){ defer wg.Done address :=fmt.Sprintf("127.0.0.1:%d",j) conn,err :=net.Dial("tcp",address) if err !=nil{ return } }(i) } wg.Wait() } 3.0 多通道版端口扫描 package main import ( "fmt" "net" "sort" ) func worker(ports,results chan int){ for p:=range ports{ address :=fmt.

item.title: 使用Hugo搭建GitHub静态站点
item.author: Jason
item.description: Hello Hugo ​ My Name is Jason. I’m a Coder,Nice to meet you! 1. Hugo Basic ​ https://gohugo.io/getting-started/quick-start/ $ hugo new site quickstart $ cd quickstart $ git clone https://github.com/dillonzq/LoveIt.git themes/LoveIt Local Run $ hugo new posts/first_post.md $ hugo new posts/first_post.md $ echo theme = \"LoveIt\" >> config.toml $ hugo serve -D $ hugo --theme=LoveIt --baseUrl="https://Jas0n0n.github.io/" 2.Github Page https://pages.github.com/ Page e.g. https://Jas0n0n.github.io/ git clone https://github.com/Jas0n0n/Jas0n0n.github.io 3.First Commit $ hugo --destination .
